title: D901 AI Smart Camera
metaDesc: Top-tier D901 AI Camera for commercial fleets, featuring multi-channel recording and advanced AI analytics.
fullDescription: Compact all-in-one device with central control screen for freight and logistics monitoring. Supports 4-channel AHD video input, AI blind spot warnings, sentry mode, fuel theft prevention alerts, AI voice recognition, and 4G remote monitoring.
features: Multi-Channel Video: 4-channel AHD video input, simultaneous recording in H.264 format (saved separately per channel)
AI Detection & Alerts: Built-in AI algorithms for blind spot warnings, fuel theft prevention, and voice recognition
Sentry Mode: Enhanced security monitoring mode
Remote Monitoring: 4G connectivity enables remote live view, playback, track viewing, electronic fence, fleet management
Flexible Display: 10.1-inch IPS touchscreen; default 4-screen display, supports switching to single-channel full screen
Stable Power: 12V-36V wide voltage input, compliant with automotive-grade surge, overload, over-voltage, under-voltage, and short-circuit protection circuits
packaging: 1x D901 Main Unit, Cable Harness, Installation Kit
